pages.title: Industrial Blast Furnace
pages.text: The <item>Industrial Blast Furnace/$ is part of the process to <em>triple/$ ores. It produces molten metal that can be cooled into ingots in a <item>$(l:essentials:heat/fcc)fluid cooling chamber/$. It consumes <item>metal gravel/$ made in a <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/stamp)stamp mill/$ or <item>metal clumps/$ made in an <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/cleanser)ore cleanser/$.$(br2)The <item>Industrial Blast

<item>Furnace/$ also uses carbon to run, in the form of either coal or charcoal- simply insert 1 coal or charcoal to get 16 carbon units. Every unit of carbon consumed will produce 1 <item>slag/$ as a byproduct- which has a few crafting uses. Processing <item>metal gravel/$ takes 2 carbon, while processing <item>metal clumps/$ only takes 1- so it may be worth adding an <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/cleanser)ore cleanser/$ to your ore processing line

The <item>Industrial Blast Furnace/$ uses <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/rotary)rotary power/$ to run. An axle/gear can connect to the top, and the machine has a minimum speed of 2.5rad/s.$(br2)<thing>$(l:essentials/circuits)Reader circuits/$ measure the fullness of the input.$(br2)
